item.description:
What is evil?
This will be focused on the basic ideas of what is good and what is evil. Hopefully exposing what are the cause and the inhibitors to the good in the universe. This is also a nice little icebreaker meeting since it seems the group has been inactive.


What is Evil?
A.Definition of what is evil
B.What are the roots/causes/factors of “evil” in connote with mankind?
C.Evil in Society vs. Evil within ourselves
D.Is there a solution? (conclusion)
item.name: Boston Philosophy January Meetup
